outline.description: Applied inside images to differentiate them from the background

bodyFrontBg.description: Background color for secondary content areas throughout the app.

bodyBg.description: Background color for the main content throughout the app.

coverImageBg.description: Background color to use when no cover image is uploaded.

borderColor.description: Color of the border dividers between sections throughout the app.

headerBg.description: Background color for the navigation bar at the top of the app.

headerColor.description: Text color for titles in the navigation bar at the top of the app.

headerIconColor.description: Color for links and icons in the navigation bar at the top of the app.

bottomTabsBg.description: Background color for the Tab Bar navigation at the bottom of the app.

bottomTabsColor.description: Default color for icons, and labels if enabled, in the Tab Bar and More Screen. Can be overwritten in menus with custom icon colors.

bottomTabsActiveColor.description: Color for icons, and labels if enabled, when the icon is currently selected in the Tab Bar.

primaryButtonBg.description: Background color of buttons seen on Login and Signup Screen.

primaryButtonColor.description: Text color of buttons seen on Course Lesson and Topic screens.

textColor.description: Text color for the General Body content.

descLightTextColor.description: Text color for meta items like '2 days ago' and '3 Discussions'.

authBgColor.description: Background color for Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens. Login screen can also be a background image.

authTextColor.description: Text color for Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens.

authFieldBgColor.description: Background color for input fields on Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens.

authFieldTextColor.description: Text color for input fields on Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens.

authButtonBgColor.description: Background color for buttons on Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens.

authButtonTextColor.description: Text color for buttons on Login, Forgot Password, and related authentication screens.

regBgColor.description: Background color for Registration and Activation Code screens. Registration screen can also be a background image.

regTextColor.description: Text color for Registration and Activation Code screens.

regFieldBgColor.description: Background color for input fields and products on Registration and Activation Code screens.

regFieldTextColor.description: Text color for input fields and products on Registration and Activation Code screens.

regButtonBgColor.description: Background color for buttons on Registration and Activation Code screens.

regButtonTextColor.description: Text color for buttons on Registration and Activation Code screens.

androidStatusBgColor.description: Background color for the Android Status Bar.

coursesLabelCompleted.description: Background color for courses completed status label.

coursesLabelProgress.description: Background color for courses in progress status label.

coursesLabelStart.description: Background color for courses start course status label.

coursesLabelFree.description: Background color for courses free status label.

coursesLabelNotEnrolled.description: Background color for courses not enrolled status label.

outline.description: Applied inside images to differentiate them from the background

short.description: Use when components require minor changes, micro-Interactions, and fades

medium.description: Use when components require medium changes, small expansions, and notifications

long.description: Use when components require major changes, expansions, and distance movement

short.description: Expansions and other change in states that require attention during movement

long.description: Alerts, notifications, sheets and other mediations that enter the screen with movement

enter.description: Decelerated easing. Use when an object enters from out of screen to reveal extra information.

exit.description: Accelerated easing. Use when object leaves the screen to hide element.

transition.description: Standard easing. Use to transition between different states of the same element in screen.

emphasize.description: Elastic easing. Use to draw attention to a specific action or specific information. Duration must be over 200ms.
